org.osate.xtext.aadl2.agcl.analysis.util

Class Template

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osate.xtext.aadl2.agcl.analysis.util.Template

  • public class Template
extends java.lang.Object
    A minimal template substitution class. Templates have meta-variables of the form ${name}, and these are substituted by strings according to a given Map<String,Object>.
    Author:
    Ernesto Posse

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Template(java.lang.String pattern) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getPattern() 
      java.lang.String substitute(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> substitution)
      Substitutes all template variables by their String value as defined in the given substitution map.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Template

        public Template(java.lang.String pattern)

    • Method Detail

      • getPattern

        public java.lang.String getPattern()

      • substitute

        public java.lang.String substitute(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> substitution)
        Substitutes all template variables by their String value as defined in the given substitution map.
        Parameters:
        substitution - A map associating template variables with objects whose string representation is to replace the corresponding variable
        Returns:
        The template pattern with all the variables replaced according to the given substitution map.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - is a variable used in the pattern is undefined in the substitution map.
